name: Orion (itch) (ssj5 birdman)
description: Orion is an adventure platform game where the player must navigate through various levels each with its own set of challenges. You will be playing as a hunter named Orion who was given the task to retrieve a magical artefact from bandits due to his stealthy attributes. His main weapon is a bow and his speed and jumping ability helps him dodge enemy bandits with ease.
